resources.string: Giovanni is an explorer in a perilous situation: when exploring a cave that could contain interesting artifacts, he became trapped on a nest of hungry monsters!
Now, he must wait for the dynamite to blow off the way for his exit.
But be careful! The monsters are really hungry and will eat anything on their way. Take advantage of this to make them eat each other.
The monsters will come out of their nest. Stay away from it!
Use the directions to avoid the perils while you wait for your freedom.
Follow the map for a more broad view of our situation. Yellow spots indicates walls, red dots are dangers. You are the blue spot.
